title: WTB: Buck Herzog T213-2 and T214

posts.post_title: WTB: Buck Herzog T213-2 and T214
posts.post_content:
I know it's a long shot, but looking for any condition example of a Buck Herzog T213-2 (B on shirt and no B) and a T214 Victory.

Contact me via PM if you have anything available.

Thank you!

Bill
